about_the_game:
The T34 pack contains the heavy american T34 premium tank, 7 days of premium time and 1000 gold.

T34 - The heavy bruiser

This american tier IV premium tank can deal with almost anything it will meet. Heavy armor, big gun, decent speed. Perfect for crushing through enemy frontlines!

Premium Tanks earn +50% more silver and crew experience during battles.

1000 gold

Gold can be used ingame to buy silver, premium time, premium vehicles and more. Use it to climb the tech tree even faster!

7 days of premium time

With an active premium account you will earn +50% more silver and crew experience during battles. Use this additional experience to train up your own, legendary ace crew!

T34 - The heavy bruiser

This american tier IV premium tank can deal with almost anything it will meet. Heavy armor, big gun, decent speed. Perfect for crushing through enemy frontlines!

Premium Tanks earn +50% more silver and crew experience during battles.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 680, OpenGL 3.2 or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Only 64-bit systems are supported
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 680, OpenGL 3.2 or higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Only 64-bit systems are supported

name: Tanks2.DE - T34 Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 520 or DirectX 11 compatible equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Only 64-bit systems are supported
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 680 or DirectX 11 compatible equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Only 64-bit systems are supported

short_description: The T34 pack contains the heavy american T34 tank, 7 days of premium time and 1000 gold.
